1: וַתְּהִ֨י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> צַעֲקַ֥ת <sup>6818 </sup> <n>cry</n> הָעָ֛ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <sup>802 </sup> <n>and of their wives</n> גְּדוֹלָ֑ה <sup>1419 </sup> <n>And there was a great</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> אֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>251 </sup> <n>against their brethren</n> הַיְּהוּדִֽים׃ <sup>3064 </sup> <n>the Jews</n>
2: וְיֵשׁ֙ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>For there were</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אֹמְרִ֔ים <sup>559 </sup> <n>that said</n> בָּנֵ֥ינוּ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>We our sons</n> וּבְנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and our daughters</n> אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> רַבִּ֑ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>[are] many</n> וְנִקְחָ֥ה <sup>3947 </sup> <n>therefore we take up</n> דָגָ֖ן <sup>1715 </sup> <n>corn</n> וְנֹאכְלָ֥ה <sup>398 </sup> <n>[for them] that we may eat</n> וְנִחְיֶֽה׃ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>and live</n>
3: וְיֵשׁ֙ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>[Some] also there were</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אֹמְרִ֔ים <sup>559 </sup> <n>that said</n> שְׂדֹתֵ֛ינוּ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>our lands</n> וּכְרָמֵ֥ינוּ <sup>3754 </sup> <n>vineyards</n> וּבָתֵּ֖ינוּ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and houses</n> אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> עֹרְבִ֑ים <sup>6148 </sup> <n>We have mortgaged</n> וְנִקְחָ֥ה <sup>3947 </sup> <n>that we might buy</n> דָגָ֖ן <sup>1715 </sup> <n>corn</n> בָּרָעָֽב׃ <sup>7458 </sup> <n>because of the dearth</n>
4: וְיֵשׁ֙ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>There were</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אֹמְרִ֔ים <sup>559 </sup> <n>also that said</n> לָוִ֥ינוּ <sup>3867 </sup> <n>We have borrowed</n> כֶ֖סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>money</n> לְמִדַּ֣ת <sup>4060 </sup> <n>tribute</n> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>for the king's</n> שְׂדֹתֵ֖ינוּ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>[and that upon] our lands</n> וּכְרָמֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>3754 </sup> <n>and vineyards</n>
5: וְעַתָּ֗ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> כִּבְשַׂ֤ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>Yet now our flesh</n> אַחֵ֙ינוּ֙ <sup>251 </sup> <n>of our brethren</n> בְּשָׂרֵ֔נוּ <sup>1320 </sup> <n>[is] as the flesh</n> כִּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>our children</n> בָּנֵ֑ינוּ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>as their children</n> וְהִנֵּ֣ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> כֹ֠בְשִׁים <sup>3533 </sup> <n>and lo we bring into bondage</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בָּנֵ֨ינוּ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>our sons</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֹתֵ֜ינוּ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and our daughters</n> לַעֲבָדִ֗ים <sup>5650 </sup> <n>to be servants</n> וְיֵ֨שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>are</n> מִבְּנֹתֵ֤ינוּ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and [some] of our daughters</n> נִכְבָּשׁוֹת֙ <sup>3533 </sup> <n>brought unto bondage</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n> לְאֵ֣ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> יָדֵ֔נוּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>because</n> וּשְׂדֹתֵ֥ינוּ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>have our lands</n> וּכְרָמֵ֖ינוּ <sup>3754 </sup> <n>and vineyards</n> לַאֲחֵרִֽים׃ <sup>312 </sup> <n>[to redeem them] for other men</n>
6: וַיִּ֥חַר <sup>2734 </sup> <n>angry</n> לִ֖י מְאֹ֑ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>And I was very</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>I</n> שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>when I heard</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> זַֽעֲקָתָ֔ם <sup>2201 </sup> <n>their cry</n> וְאֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>and these words</n> הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <sup>428 </sup> <n>and these</n>
7: וַיִּמָּלֵ֨ךְ <sup>4427 </sup> <n>Then I consulted</n> לִבִּ֜י <sup>3820 </sup> <n>with myself</n> עָלַ֗י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> וָאָרִ֙יבָה֙ <sup>7378 </sup> <n>and I rebuked</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַחֹרִ֣ים <sup>2715 </sup> <n>the nobles</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַסְּגָנִ֔ים <sup>5461 </sup> <n>and the rulers</n> וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> לָהֶ֔ם מַשָּׁ֥א <sup>5378 </sup> <n>debt</n> אִישׁ־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> בְּאָחִ֖יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>of his brother</n> אַתֶּ֣ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> נֹשִׁ֑אים <sup>5383 </sup> <n>creditor</n> וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I set</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> קְהִלָּ֥ה <sup>6952 </sup> <n>assembly</n> גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>a great</n>
8: וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <sup>559 </sup> <n>And I said</n> לָהֶ֗ם אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> קָ֠נִינוּ <sup>7069 </sup> <n>have redeemed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַחֵ֨ינוּ <sup>251 </sup> <n>our brethren</n> הַיְּהוּדִ֜ים <sup>3064 </sup> <n>the Jews</n> הַנִּמְכָּרִ֤ים <sup>4376 </sup> <n>which were sold</n> לַגּוֹיִם֙ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>unto the heathen</n> כְּדֵ֣י <sup>1767 </sup> <n>unto them We after our ability</n> בָ֔נוּ וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>even</n> אַתֶּ֛ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> תִּמְכְּר֥וּ <sup>4376 </sup> <n>and will ye even sell</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲחֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>251 </sup> <n>your brothers</n> וְנִמְכְּרוּ־ <sup>4376 </sup> <n>may be sold</n> לָ֑נוּ וַֽיַּחֲרִ֔ישׁוּ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>unto us? Then held they their peace</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> מָצְא֖וּ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>and found</n> דָּבָֽר׃ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>answer</n> ס
9: [וַיֹּאמֶר כ] (וָאֹומַ֕ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>answer</n> ק) לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> ט֥וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>It [is] not good</n> הַדָּבָ֖ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אַתֶּ֣ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> עֹשִׂ֑ים <sup>6213 </sup> <n>ye do</n> הֲל֞וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> בְּיִרְאַ֤ת <sup>3374 </sup> <n>in the fear</n> אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of our God</n> תֵּלֵ֔כוּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>walk</n> מֵחֶרְפַּ֖ת <sup>2781 </sup> <n>because of the reproach</n> הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n> אוֹיְבֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>341 </sup> <n>our enemies</n>
10: וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>and likewise</n> אֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אַחַ֣י <sup>251 </sup> <n>I likewise [and] my brethren</n> וּנְעָרַ֔י <sup>5288 </sup> <n>and my servants</n> נֹשִׁ֥ים <sup>5383 </sup> <n>might exact</n> בָּהֶ֖ם כֶּ֣סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of them money</n> וְדָגָ֑ן <sup>1715 </sup> <n>and corn</n> נַֽעַזְבָה־ <sup>5800 </sup> <n>I pray you let us leave off</n> נָּ֖א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמַּשָּׁ֥א <sup>4855 </sup> <n>this usury</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n>
11: הָשִׁיבוּ֩ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Restore</n> נָ֨א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> לָהֶ֜ם כְּהַיּ֗וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>I pray you to them even this day</n> שְׂדֹתֵיהֶ֛ם <sup>7704 </sup> <n>their lands</n> כַּרְמֵיהֶ֥ם <sup>3754 </sup> <n>their vineyards</n> זֵיתֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>2132 </sup> <n>their oliveyards</n> וּבָתֵּיהֶ֑ם <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and their houses</n> וּמְאַ֨ת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>also the hundredth</n> הַכֶּ֤סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>[part] of the money</n> וְהַדָּגָן֙ <sup>1715 </sup> <n>and of the corn</n> הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>the wine</n> וְהַיִּצְהָ֔ר <sup>3323 </sup> <n>and the oil</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אַתֶּ֖ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> נֹשִׁ֥ים <sup>5383 </sup> <n>that ye exact</n> בָּהֶֽם׃
12: וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then said</n> נָשִׁ֗יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>they We will restore</n> וּמֵהֶם֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nothing</n> נְבַקֵּ֔שׁ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>[them] and will require</n> כֵּ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>exactly</n> נַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>nothing of them so will we do</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> אוֹמֵ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>as thou sayest</n> וָאֶקְרָא֙ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>Then I called</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <sup>3548 </sup> <n>the priests</n> וָֽאַשְׁבִּיעֵ֔ם <sup>7650 </sup> <n>and took an oath</n> לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>of them that they should do</n> כַּדָּבָ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>according to this promise</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>to this</n>
13: גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> חָצְנִ֣י <sup>2684 </sup> <n>my lap</n> נָעַ֗רְתִּי <sup>5287 </sup> <n>Also I shook</n> וָֽאֹמְרָ֡ה <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> כָּ֣כָה <sup>3602 </sup> <n>Thus</n> יְנַעֵ֪ר <sup>5287 </sup> <n>shake out</n> הָֽאֱלֹהִ֟ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>So God</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> הָאִישׁ֩ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every man</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יָקִ֜ים <sup>6965 </sup> <n>that performeth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַדָּבָ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>not this promise</n> הַזֶּ֗ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> מִבֵּיתוֹ֙ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>from his house</n> וּמִ֣יגִיע֔וֹ <sup>3018 </sup> <n>and from his labour</n> וְכָ֛כָה <sup>3602 </sup> <n>thus</n> יִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> נָע֖וּר <sup>5287 </sup> <n>even thus be he shaken out</n> וָרֵ֑ק <sup>7386 </sup> <n>and emptied</n> וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> כָֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הַקָּהָ֜ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>And all the congregation</n> אָמֵ֗ן <sup>543 </sup> <n>Amen</n> וַֽיְהַלְלוּ֙ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>and praised</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>did</n> הָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And the people</n> כַּדָּבָ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>according to this promise</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>to this</n>
14: גַּ֞ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Moreover</n> מִיּ֣וֹם ׀ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>Moreover from the time</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>i</n> צִוָּ֣ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>that I was appointed</n> אֹתִ֗י <sup>853 </sup> לִהְי֣וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> פֶּחָם֮ <sup>6346 </sup> <n>to be their governor</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> יְהוּדָה֒ <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> מִשְּׁנַ֣ת <sup>8141 </sup> <n>year</n> עֶשְׂרִ֗ים <sup>6242 </sup> <n>from the twentieth</n> וְ֠עַד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> שְׁנַ֨ת <sup>8141 </sup> <n>year</n> שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <sup>7970 </sup> <n>and thirtieth</n> וּשְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <sup>8147 </sup> <n>even unto the two</n> לְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֣סְתְּא <sup>783 </sup> <n>of Artaxerxes</n> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> שָׁנִ֖ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> שְׁתֵּ֣ים <sup>8147 </sup> <n>both</n> עֶשְׂרֵ֑ה <sup>6240 </sup> <n>ten</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>my</n> וְאַחַ֔י <sup>251 </sup> <n>I and my brethren</n> לֶ֥חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>the bread</n> הַפֶּ֖חָה <sup>6346 </sup> <n>of the governor</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>neither</n> אָכַֽלְתִּי׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>have not eaten</n>
15: וְהַפַּחוֹת֩ <sup>6346 </sup> <n>governors</n> הָרִאשֹׁנִ֨ים <sup>7223 </sup> <n>But the former</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לְפָנַ֜י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>that [had been] before</n> הִכְבִּ֣ידוּ <sup>3513 </sup> <n>me were chargeable</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הָעָ֗ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto the people</n> וַיִּקְח֨וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and had taken</n> מֵהֶ֜ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>them</n> בְּלֶ֤חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>of them bread</n> וָיַ֙יִן֙ <sup>3196 </sup> <n>and wine</n> אַחַר֙ <sup>310 </sup> <n>beside</n> כֶּֽסֶף־ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of silver</n> שְׁקָלִ֣ים <sup>8255 </sup> <n>shekels</n> אַרְבָּעִ֔ים <sup>705 </sup> <n>forty</n> גַּ֥ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>yea even</n> נַעֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>5288 </sup> <n>their servants</n> שָׁלְט֣וּ <sup>7980 </sup> <n>bare rule</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הָעָ֑ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>over the people</n> וַאֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> עָשִׂ֣יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>but so did</n> כֵ֔ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> מִפְּנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>not I because</n> יִרְאַ֥ת <sup>3374 </sup> <n>of the fear</n> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n>
16: וְ֠גַם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> בִּמְלֶ֜אכֶת <sup>4399 </sup> <n>in the work</n> הַחוֹמָ֤ה <sup>2346 </sup> <n>of this wall</n> הַזֹּאת֙ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> הֶחֱזַ֔קְתִּי <sup>2388 </sup> <n>Yea also I continued</n> וְשָׂדֶ֖ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>we any land</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> קָנִ֑ינוּ <sup>7069 </sup> <n>neither bought</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> נְעָרַ֔י <sup>5288 </sup> <n>and all my servants</n> קְבוּצִ֥ים <sup>6908 </sup> <n>[were] gathered</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> הַמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <sup>4399 </sup> <n>thither unto the work</n>
17: וְהַיְּהוּדִ֨ים <sup>3064 </sup> <n>of the Jews</n> וְהַסְּגָנִ֜ים <sup>5461 </sup> <n>and rulers</n> מֵאָ֧ה <sup>3967 </sup> <n>an hundred</n> וַחֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <sup>2572 </sup> <n>and fifty</n> אִ֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>besides</n> וְהַבָּאִ֥ים <sup>935 </sup> <n>beside those that came</n> אֵלֵ֛ינוּ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>unto us from among the heathen</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>were</n> סְבִיבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <sup>5439 </sup> <n>that [are] about us</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>at</n> שֻׁלְחָנִֽי׃ <sup>7979 </sup> <n>Moreover [there were] at my table</n>
18: וַאֲשֶׁר֩ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הָיָ֨ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> נַעֲשֶׂ֜ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Now [that] which was prepared</n> לְי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[for me] daily</n> אֶחָ֗ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>[was] one</n> שׁ֣וֹר <sup>7794 </sup> <n>ox</n> אֶחָ֞ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>was one</n> צֹ֠אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>sheep</n> שֵׁשׁ־ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>[and] six</n> בְּרֻר֤וֹת <sup>1305 </sup> <n>choice</n> וְצִפֳּרִים֙ <sup>6833 </sup> <n>also fowls</n> נַֽעֲשׂוּ־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>were prepared</n> לִ֔י וּבֵ֨ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>and once</n> עֲשֶׂ֧רֶת <sup>6235 </sup> <n>for me and once in ten</n> יָמִ֛ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יַ֖יִן <sup>3196 </sup> <n>of all sorts of wine</n> לְהַרְבֵּ֑ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>store</n> וְעִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>yet for all</n> זֶ֗ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> לֶ֤חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>not I the bread</n> הַפֶּחָה֙ <sup>6346 </sup> <n>of the governor</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> בִקַּ֔שְׁתִּי <sup>1245 </sup> <n>this required</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> כָֽבְדָ֥ה <sup>3513 </sup> <n>was heavy</n> הָעֲבֹדָ֖ה <sup>5656 </sup> <n>because the bondage</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הָעָ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>upon this people</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n>
19: זָכְרָה־ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>Think</n> לִּ֥י אֱלֹהַ֖י <sup>430 </sup> <n>upon me my God</n> לְטוֹבָ֑ה <sup>2896 </sup> <n>for good</n> כֹּ֥ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>i</n> עָשִׂ֖יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[according] to all that I have done</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הָעָ֥ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>for this people</n> הַזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> פ
